descriptionHtml:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
IMPORTANT NOTE: I am happy to allow anybody to use my work in your mods. Anything I make, and release, can be considered a modders resource. 

However, this only applies to those who are providing the work freely. You may NOT use my work in any mod that you intend to accept donations for. I do not work so you can profit off my efforts. Please respect my wishes.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~



This is a re-working of Laast\'s sun texture to give the sun a more fantasy/dreamy look. If you are looking for a realistic sun texture, this is not it. For a more realistic sun I would suggest trying Laast\'s original sun texture.

I made this texture with ENB in mind. 

Laast\'s sun texture:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=116

I am using HD6 Cinematic Lighting ENB in the screenshots above:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4142
author: AnOldFriend
